review: I liked this at first but after awhile it gets to be a pain to always have a device on hand to stream from.  Also, I purchased two and found that I couldn't stream to my living room for my kids and stream a movie to my room at the same time.  I searched online and sadly there is no solution for this problem, only to have a 2nd device to stream to 2nd Chromecast.  I opted for the fire stick for my next purchase, only $10 more and it does so much more including operate completely independent from other devices.
